item.title: 51 Chelmer Road e9 6ay, 12th November
item.description:
Reported many many many times their rubbish is again all over the street. Can you please fine these people? I do pay Council Tax and I had enough of wasting my time reporting my neighbours.

item.title: Large tree was hanging off now broken on the pavement, 12th November
item.description:

item.title: 2 piles of fly tipping on The Course playing green, 12th November
item.description:
2 big piles of cupboards clothes fridge carcasses etc etc, an absolute eyesore on a beautiful playing field. Dangerous and attracting vermin. One large pile been there weeks and reported multiple times but now an additional separate pile only 10 feet apart. I thought fly tipping was a 24 hour response! For the sake of the residents please act before more and more piles are added.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crouch Croft, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 94 Brondesbury villas, 12th November
item.description:
Outside 94, 96 needs sweeping The drain outside 98 and opposite 98 is full of leaves, when it rains it causes flooding on the road Please help before my road floods again

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Villas, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public litter bin full and almost over flowing, 12th November
item.description:
This public litter becomes full quickly due to schools, dog walkers etc using footpath etc. Needs emptying every week. Bin can sometimes be left for a number of weeks. Can you please empty and clean immediate area. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Magpie Hall Lane, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement road need clearing of leaves, 12th November
item.description:
The corner of Hillingdon, Northall and Barnehurst roads on the pavement need to be swept of leaves and cleared as they present a significant hazard especially to the elderly and those with disabilities and small children.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillingdon Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I have an electric vehicle. I have to remove these line bikes on a daily basis ASB from the EV charging point,bay. These line bikes are being discarded in selfish manner damaging people's car, property on a daily basis. I am a resident & had to move over 20 line bikes out of the EV charging point just to use it because the bikes were left in the wrong bay., 12th November
